  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalPattern

      public PersonalPattern(String name, Set<Tile> tiles, List<int[]> checkToPoints) throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Constructor of a personal pattern given the params
      Parameters:
      name - name of the pattern
      tiles - tiles in the pattern, must be immutable
      checkToPoints - list of couple [num of corrects, points], must be immutable
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if the parameters are invalid
